data.DescriptionHtml:
Cold energy spreads out in all directions from the point of origin, dealing 3d12 points of frostburn damage +1 point per caster level (maximum +20) to nearby enemies.
Like other frostburn spells, mass frostburn cures cold subtype creatures in its area rather than damaging them.
data.Name: Frostburn, Mass
data.Target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
